cause.description:
Abortion is murder and it needs to be stopped. it not only hurts the mother it hurts God as well. You never know who you might be aborting. the reason we haven't been able to find a cure for soo many disabilities and dieseases is because we keep killing our chances. Join this Cause.
1. Abortion is wrong
2. It should end
3. Everyone deserves the right to live
cause.name: STOP ABORTION NOW!!
